title: Help identify this font - ROMA
content:
Any ideas about this font ?   
   
Thank you   
Leon   
   
 ![Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123429im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33148.gif)
author: leonx

comments.content: I'm pretty sure that it's just [Courier New](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123429/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1MI) that has been stretched way more than is acceptable.

I was going to say the same thing, but I think it's something else. Notice the thick and thin strokes on the M and A. If it was Courier (New or otherwise), the angled strokes should be the same thickness. I think it's some kind of "letter quality" inkjet or dot matrix font, stretched of course.   
   
Here it is unstretched:   
   
 ![unstretched](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123429im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33150.gif)
